- Partner Portal <[[https://turbonomic.webinfinity.com/]]> - Deal Registration <[[https://turbonomic.webinfinity.com/]]> - Enablement <[[https://turbonomic.webinfinity.com/]]> - Marketing Tools & Resources <[[https://turbonomic.webinfinity.com/]]> Featured Turbonomic Partner Town Hall Webcast – September 10th Join us on Monday, September 10th at 1:00 pm ET / 11:00 am PT for our Quarterly Town Hall Webcast. This is a fantastic opportunity for you to connect with your peers, learn about the latest and greatest Turbonomic product and company announcements, and how you can leverage these initiatives to accelerate your selling efforts. Click here to register <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/quarterly-partner-town-hall/]]> for this online event.
News and Announcements Turbonomic Achieves AWS Migration Competency Status Turbonomic has achieved its AWS Migration Competency status. In doing so, it differentiates us as an AWS Partner Network (APN) company that provides AWS customers with discovery, planning, and ongoing optimization of their AWS instances. Turbonomic delivers accurate, real-time view of on-premises workload consumption with the resulting recommendations of instance types. In addition, customers benefit from “what if” modeling capabilities, coupled with the ability to optimize their on-premises workloads before moving them to AWS. Learn More <[[https://turbonomic.com/press-releases/aws-cloud-migration/]]>.
Turbonomic Extends AI-Powered Workload Automation to Kubernetes-As-A Service Offerings Turbonomic extends its unique self-managing Kubernetes capabilities with new support for Amazon Elastic Container Service for Kubernetes (EKS), Microsoft Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS), Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE), and Pivotal Container Service (PKS). Customers now can continuously assure performance, maximize elasticity and maintain compliance with business policies across their Kubernetes-as-a-Service (KaaS) offering of choice. Learn More <[[https://turbonomic.com/press-releases/kubernetes-containers/]]>.
Visit our Cloud Migration Resource Center <[[https://turbonomic.com/solutions/accelerate-de-risk-cloud-migrations/]]> to learn more about Turbonomic’s cloud migration capabilities and industry best practices. Promotions Limited Time Offer – Q3 TurboBoost Campaign! Calling All Turbo Platinum Partners – earn a $100 Amazon Gift Card for every new customer meeting and a $300 Amazon Gift Card for every POV during the months of August, September and October*. Contact your Partner Director for additional details on this program and how you can sign up to participate!
*Rules and regulations apply. This program is only applicable for Platinum Partners.
Earn Your Turbonomic Accreditation TODAY! Take Turbonomic Sales and Technical Accreditation anytime, anywhere, with our new online training courses. Whether you’re a Sales Consultant, Sales Engineer, or Systems Architect, we have a track that will quickly help you sell, position and deploy Turbonomic. Visit our Partner Portal to learn more! <[[https://turbonomic.webinfinity.com/]]>
Platinum Partners – if you are one of the first 50 individuals to take the Sales Engineer Accreditation Course, you will receive a $100 Amazon Gift Card
Get $500 (USD) for Any New Logo You Bring to Turbonomic! We want to reward you, our partners, for your on-going support and commitment to Turbonomic with a new logo reward incentive. If you are a Gold or Platinum Partner, you are eligible to earn $500 for every new logo you close with Turbonomic. Below are the qualifications:
- Only partners with Gold or Platinum designation can participate in the program
- Deal size must be a minimum of $50,000 (USD)
- The opportunity must have an approved deal registration and close within 6 months of target closed date
- Opportunities with Special Pricing over 50% do not qualify
- New logos are defined as a company that has not purchased anything from Turbonomic in the last 2 years and does not have an active user license with us today.
To learn if your opportunity applies for this reward, please reach out to your Turbonomic Account Rep, Partner Director or simply email PartnerDesk@Turbonomic.com <[[mailto:PartnerDesk@Turbonomic.com]]>. Events Turbonomic EMEA Partner Summit (London, UK) – September 18th Join us at this year’s Turbonomic EMEA Partner Summit to be held on Tuesday, September 18th at the Intercontinental Park Lane, London, UK. This event brings together eco-system partners and customers, in the same forum, to learn more about Turbonomic’s vision and direction from our leadership team. Charles Crouchman, CTO will take you through our product roadmap. Chris Gorecki, VP of Global Channel and Alliances will discuss the new Turbonomic partner program and how you can leverage it to accelerate profitability.
Space is limited so click here <[[https://turbonomic.com/emea-partner-summit/]]> to reserve your seat!
Visit us at these upcoming events:
- August 26-30: VMWorld 2018
- September 13: AWS Summit Atlanta
- September 24-28: Microsoft Ignite 2018
- November 26-30: AWS re:Invent 2018
For a complete listing of upcoming Turbonomic events, please click here <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/events/]]>. Please visit the Partner Portal <[[https://turbonomic.webinfinity.com/]]>.
